name: Hopefield: Survivors
description:
This game is a introduction to my third game called Hopefield: Dead Night! 

There is something wrong happening in Hopefield! 

The year is 1995 and somewhere in the city there was a tremor, followed by a strong light came from the mountains. But after the light disappeared, what came next wos just darkness. 

Help a lost population to find a way out of this holocaust.

Survivors  is a action/horror  game. 

* Full controller support

* Secrets

* 2 endings
